verses.verse: In the five <WH2568> and twentieth <WH6242> year <WH8141> of our captivity <WH1546>, in the beginning <WH7218> of the year <WH8141>, in the tenth <WH6218> day of the month <WH2320>, in the fourteenth <WH702> year <WH8141> after <WH310> that the city <WH5892> was struck <WH5221>, in the same <WH6106> day <WH3117> the hand <WH3027> of the Lord <WH3068> was upon me <WH935>, and brought me there.

In the visions <WH4759> of God <WH430> brought <WH935> he me into the land <WH776> of Israel <WH3478>, and set <WH5117> me upon a very <WH3966> high <WH1364> mountain <WH2022>, by which was as the frame <WH4011> of a city <WH5892> on the south <WH5045>.

And he brought <WH935> me there <WH376>, and, behold, there was a man, whose appearance <WH4758> was like the appearance <WH4758> of brass <WH5178>, with a line <WH6616> of flax <WH6593> in his hand <WH3027>, and a measuring <WH4060> reed <WH7070>; and he stood <WH5975> in the gate <WH8179>.

And the man <WH376> said <WH1696> unto me <WH1121>, Son of man <WH120>, behold <WH7200> with your eyes <WH5869>, and hear <WH8085> with your ears <WH241>, and set <WH7760> your heart <WH3820> upon all that I shall show <WH7200> you <WH4616>; for to the intent that I might show <WH7200> them unto you are you brought <WH935> here <WH5046>: declare all that you see <WH7200> to the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>.

And behold a wall <WH2346> on the outside <WH2351> of the house <WH1004> round about <WH5439>, and in the man <WH376>'s hand <WH3027> a measuring <WH4060> reed <WH7070> of six <WH8337> cubits <WH520> long by the cubit <WH520> and a hand breadth <WH2948>: so he measured <WH4058> the breadth <WH7341> of the building <WH1146>, one <WH259> reed <WH7070>; and the height <WH6967>, one <WH259> reed <WH7070>.

Then came <WH935> he unto the gate <WH8179> which looks <WH6440> toward <WH1870> the east <WH6921>, and went up <WH5927> the stairs <WH4609> there <WH4058>, and measured the threshold <WH5592> of the gate <WH8179>, which was one <WH259> reed <WH7070> broad <WH7341>; and the other <WH259> threshold <WH5592> of the gate <WH259>, which was one reed <WH7070> broad <WH7341>.

And every little chamber <WH8372> was one <WH259> reed <WH7070> long <WH753>, and one <WH259> reed <WH7070> broad <WH7341>; and between the little chambers <WH8372> were five <WH2568> cubits <WH520>; and the threshold <WH5592> of the gate <WH8179> by <WH681> the porch <WH197> of the gate <WH8179> inside <WH1004> was one <WH259> reed <WH7070>.
He measured <WH4058> also the porch <WH197> of the gate <WH8179> inside <WH1004>, one <WH259> reed <WH7070>.

Then measured <WH4058> he the porch <WH197> of the gate <WH8179>, eight <WH8083> cubits <WH520>; and the posts <WH352> there <WH8147>, two cubits <WH520>; and the porch <WH197> of the gate <WH8179> was inward <WH1004>.

And the little chambers <WH8372> of the gate <WH8179> eastward <WH1870> were three <WH7969> on this side <WH6311>, and three <WH7969> on that side <WH6311>; they three <WH7969> were of one <WH259> measure <WH4060>: and the posts <WH352> had one <WH259> measure on this side and on that side <WH4060>.
And he measured <WH4058> the breadth <WH7341> of the entry <WH6607> of the gate <WH8179>, ten <WH6235> cubits <WH520>; and the length <WH753> of the gate <WH8179>, thirteen <WH7969> cubits <WH520>.

The space <WH1366> also before <WH6440> the little chambers <WH8372> was one <WH259> cubit <WH520> on this side <WH1366>, and the space was one cubit <WH520> on that side <WH8372>: and the little chambers were six <WH8337> cubits <WH520> on this side <WH8337>, and six cubits on that side <WH520>.

He measured <WH4058> then the gate <WH8179> from the roof <WH1406> of one little chamber <WH8372> to the roof <WH1406> of another <WH7341>: the breadth was five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520>, door <WH6607> against door <WH6607>.
He made <WH6213> also posts <WH352> of sixty <WH8346> cubits <WH520>, even unto the post <WH352> of the court <WH2691> round about <WH5439> the gate <WH8179>.
And from the face <WH6440> of the gate <WH8179> of the entrance <WH2978> unto the face <WH6440> of the porch <WH197> of the inner <WH6442> gate <WH8179> were fifty <WH2572> cubits <WH520>.

And there were narrow <WH331> windows <WH2474> to the little chambers <WH8372>, and to their posts <WH352> inside <WH6441> the gate <WH8179> round about <WH5439>, and likewise to the arches <WH361>: and windows <WH2474> were round about <WH5439> inward <WH6441>: and upon each post <WH352> were palm trees <WH8561>.

Then brought <WH935> he me into the outward <WH2435> court <WH2691>, and <WH3957>, behold, there were chambers, and a pavement <WH7531> made <WH6213> for the court <WH2691> round about <WH5439>: thirty <WH7970> chambers <WH3957> were upon the pavement <WH7531>.
And the pavement <WH7531> by the side <WH3802> of the gates <WH8179> over against <WH5980> the length <WH753> of the gates <WH8179> was the lower <WH8481> pavement <WH7531>.

Then he measured <WH4058> the breadth <WH7341> from the forefront <WH6440> of the lower <WH8481> gate <WH8179> unto the forefront <WH6440> of the inner <WH6442> court <WH2691> outside <WH2351>, a hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520> eastward <WH6921> and northward <WH6828>.
And the gate <WH8179> of the outward <WH2435> court <WH2691> that looked <WH6440> toward <WH1870> the north <WH6828>, he measured <WH4058> the length <WH753> there <WH7341>, and the breadth there.

And the little chambers <WH8372> there were three <WH7969> on this side and three <WH7969> on that side <WH352>; and the posts there and the arches <WH361> there were after the measure <WH4060> of the first <WH7223> gate <WH8179>: the length <WH753> there was fifty <WH2572> cubits <WH520>, and the breadth <WH7341> five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520>.

And their windows <WH2474>, and their arches <WH361>, and their palm trees <WH8561>, were after the measure <WH4060> of the gate <WH8179> that looks <WH6440> toward <WH1870> the east <WH6921>; and they went up <WH5927> unto it by seven <WH7651> steps <WH4609>; and the arches <WH361> there were before them <WH6440>.

And the gate <WH8179> of the inner <WH6442> court <WH2691> was over against the gate <WH8179> toward the north <WH6828>, and toward the east <WH6921>; and he measured <WH4058> from gate <WH8179> to gate <WH8179> a hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520>.

After that he brought <WH3212> me toward <WH1870> the south <WH1864>, and behold a gate <WH8179> toward <WH1870> the south <WH1864>: and he measured <WH4058> the posts <WH352> there and the arches <WH361> there according to these measures <WH4060>.

And there were windows <WH2474> in it and in the arches <WH361> there round about <WH5439>, like those windows <WH2474>: the length <WH753> was fifty <WH2572> cubits <WH520>, and the breadth <WH7341> five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520>.

And there were seven <WH7651> steps <WH4609> to go up <WH5930> to it <WH361>, and the arches there were before <WH6440> them <WH8561>: and it had palm trees, one <WH259> on this side <WH259>, and another on that side <WH352>, upon the posts there.

And there was a gate <WH8179> in the inner <WH6442> court <WH2691> toward <WH1870> the south <WH1864>: and he measured <WH4058> from gate <WH8179> to gate <WH8179> toward <WH1870> the south <WH1864> a hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520>.
And he brought <WH935> me to the inner <WH6442> court <WH2691> by the south <WH1864> gate <WH8179>: and he measured <WH4058> the south <WH1864> gate <WH8179> according to these measures <WH4060>;

And the little chambers <WH8372> there <WH352>, and the posts there <WH361>, and the arches there <WH4060>, according to these measures: and there were windows <WH2474> in it and in the arches <WH361> there round about <WH5439>: it was fifty <WH2572> cubits <WH520> long <WH753>, and five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520> broad <WH7341>.
And the arches <WH361> round about <WH5439> were five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520> long <WH753>, and five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> broad <WH7341>.

And the arches <WH361> there were toward the utter <WH2435> court <WH2691>; and palm trees <WH8561> were upon the posts <WH352> there <WH4608>: and the going up to it had eight <WH8083> steps <WH4609>.
And he brought <WH935> me into the inner <WH6442> court <WH2691> toward <WH1870> the east <WH6921>: and he measured <WH4058> the gate <WH8179> according to these measures <WH4060>.

And the little chambers <WH8372> there <WH352>, and the posts there <WH361>, and the arches there <WH4060>, were according to these measures: and there were windows <WH2474> in it and in the arches <WH361> there round about <WH5439>: it was fifty <WH2572> cubits <WH520> long <WH753>, and five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520> broad <WH7341>.

And the arches <WH361> there were toward the outward <WH2435> court <WH2691>; and palm trees <WH8561> were upon the posts <WH352> there <WH4608>, on this side, and on that side: and the going up to it had eight <WH8083> steps <WH4609>.
And he brought <WH935> me to the north <WH6828> gate <WH8179>, and measured <WH4058> it according to these measures <WH4060>;

The little chambers <WH8372> there <WH352>, the posts there <WH361>, and the arches there <WH2474>, and the windows to it round about <WH5439>: the length <WH753> was fifty <WH2572> cubits <WH520>, and the breadth <WH7341> five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520>.

And the posts <WH352> there were toward the utter <WH2435> court <WH2691>; and palm trees <WH8561> were upon the posts <WH352> there <WH4608>, on this side, and on that side: and the going up to it had eight <WH8083> steps <WH4609>.
And the chambers <WH3957> and the entries <WH6607> there were by the posts <WH352> of the gates <WH8179>, where they washed <WH1740> the burnt offering <WH5930>.

And in the porch <WH197> of the gate <WH8179> were two <WH8147> tablets <WH7979> on this side <WH7979>, and two tablets on that side <WH7819>, to kill on it the burnt offering <WH5930> and the sin offering <WH2403> and the trespass offering <WH817>.

And at the side <WH3802> outside <WH2351>, as one goes up <WH5927> to the entry <WH6607> of the north <WH6828> gate <WH8179>, were two <WH8147> tablets <WH7979>; and on the other <WH312> side <WH3802>, which was at the porch <WH197> of the gate <WH8179>, were two <WH8147> tablets <WH7979>.

Four <WH702> tablets <WH7979> were on this side <WH702>, and four tablets <WH7979> on that side <WH3802>, by the side of the gate <WH8179>; eight <WH8083> tablets <WH7979>, whereupon they killed their sacrifices <WH7819>.

And the four <WH702> tablets <WH7979> were of cut <WH1496> stone <WH68> for the burnt offering <WH5930>, of a cubit <WH520> and a half <WH2677> long <WH753>, and a cubit <WH520> and a half <WH2677> broad <WH7341>, and one <WH259> cubit <WH520> high <WH1363>: whereupon also they laid <WH3240> the instruments <WH3627> with which they killed <WH7819> the burnt offering <WH5930> and the sacrifice <WH2077>.
And inside <WH1004> were hooks <WH8240>, a <WH259> hand <WH2948> broad <WH3559>, fastened round about <WH5439>: and upon the tablets <WH7979> was the flesh <WH1320> of the offering <WH7133>.

And outside <WH2351> the inner <WH6442> gate <WH8179> were the chambers <WH3957> of the singers <WH7891> in the inner <WH6442> court <WH2691>, which was at the side <WH3802> of the north <WH6828> gate <WH8179>; and their prospect <WH6440> was toward <WH1870> the south <WH1864>: one <WH259> at the side <WH3802> of the east <WH6921> gate <WH8179> having the prospect <WH6440> toward <WH1870> the north <WH6828>.

And he said <WH1696> unto me <WH2090>, This chamber <WH3957>, whose prospect <WH6440> is toward <WH1870> the south <WH1864>, is for the priests <WH3548>, the keepers <WH8104> of the charge <WH4931> of the house <WH1004>.

And the chamber <WH3957> whose prospect <WH6440> is toward <WH1870> the north <WH6828> is for the priests <WH3548>, the keepers <WH8104> of the charge <WH4931> of the altar <WH4196>: these are the sons <WH1121> of Zadok <WH6659> among the sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878>, which come near <WH7131> to the Lord <WH3068> to minister unto him <WH8334>.

So he measured <WH4058> the court <WH2691>, a hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520> long <WH753>, and a hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520> broad <WH7341>, square <WH7251>; and the altar <WH4196> that was before <WH6440> the house <WH1004>.

And he brought <WH935> me to the porch <WH197> of the house <WH1004>, and measured <WH4058> each post <WH352> of the porch <WH197>, five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> on this side <WH2568>, and five cubits <WH520> on that side <WH7341>: and the breadth of the gate <WH8179> was three <WH7969> cubits <WH520> on this side <WH7969>, and three cubits on that side <WH520>.

The length <WH753> of the porch <WH197> was twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520>, and the breadth <WH7341> eleven <WH6249> cubits <WH520>; and he brought me by the steps <WH4609> by which they went up <WH5927> to it <WH5982>: and there were pillars by the posts <WH352>, one <WH259> on this side <WH259>, and another on that side.
